ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Observations of atmospheric minor constituents with millimeter-wave spectroscopic radiometer at Syowa station, Antarctica
ResourceHeader.Description: Atmospheric partial column (between 65 and 100 km) of nitric oxide (NO) and vertical ozone profiles from 20 to 80 km retrived from continuous ground-based millimeter-wave (250 GHz) measurements at Syowa station, Antarctica. Further details of the instrument, data processing and error analysis were described in Isono et al. (2014) (doi:10.1002/2014JA019881).
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: The millimeter-wave spectroscopic radiometer at Syowa station is operated by ISEE, Nagoya University, Japan. For data use, please contact the PI (Akira Mizuno at mizuno [at] isee.nagoya-u.ac.jp) for the details. We thank the support staffs of NIPR and ISEE/GRC for their efforts.
